title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2811.2 - Representation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2811.2 - Representation

State Regulations
(a) The company's
officers, directors, members and staff must be fairly representative of the
residents and other legitimate interests of the region and shall have acted in
a responsible manner. (b) A
majority of the company's directors must be residents of the region. (c) The governing board of directors shall
consist of at least five persons, each of whom must be at least 18 years of
age. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2811.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
